parameters.text:
=You are an expert AI research assistant. 
I will provide a list of research papers from arXiv.
Choose the paper that best aligns with my expertise and interests.

My expertise: I am learning machine learning,i did some basics,andrew ng course in ML specialization,nowadays i am trying to get fluent in Machine Learning and soon i will start advanced ml and deep learning.i want to stay intouch so that i know whats going on and i get good project ideas.
Papers:
{{$json["summaries"]}}

Your tasks:
1. Select the single most relevant paper for my expertise.
2. Explain why you chose it.
3. Explain the paper to me.
4.Summarise it if its too long,complex for me.
5.Use good wording,vocabulary.
